Performance Tracker X

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_stops=”rgba(30,74,117,0.65) 0%|rgba(30,74,117,0.65) 100%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(30,74,117,0.65)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(30,74,117,0.65)” background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/performance-tracker-header.jpg” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code admin_label=”Empty Spacer” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Text Centered – with Flag” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#F0F0F0″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Flag Row” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/hero-flag.svg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”75px||75px||true|false” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.4″ text_line_height=”2.1em” header_2_font_size=”25px” header_2_line_height=”1.28em” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”780px” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Gain complete clarity over your business

Performance Tracker X is the complete customer experience management tool that evaluates staff and financial performance, streamlines success plans, and improves your bottom line.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Main Content – with Photo” _builder_version=”4.16″ da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ admin_label=”Simple Text Blocks” _builder_version=”4.16″ collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.24.0″ text_line_height=”2.1em” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

An Indispensable Tool

Our industry-leading Performance Tracker X empowers you to run a more profitable business while helping you provide a better experience to your customers. Choose from any the following survey options:

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Orange Bullets” module_class=”orange_arrows” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ link_font=”||||on||||” ul_font_size=”16px” ul_line_height=”1.7em” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||-45px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”0px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

  • Funeral Home At-need
  • Funeral Home Pre-need
  • Low Cost Cremation Business
  • Cemetery At-need
  • Cemetery Pre-need
  • Combination

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/jcg-performance-tracker.jpg” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Knowledge is Power” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||0px||false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ locked=”off” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Accountability Management” image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/accountability-management.png” icon_placement=”left” image_icon_width=”70px” content_max_width=”100%” icon_placement_tablet=”” icon_placement_phone=”top” icon_placement_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Blurb – Accountability Management” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ header_font_size=”20px” body_line_height=”2.1em” background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” image_icon_custom_padding_tablet=”” image_icon_custom_padding_phone=”” image_icon_custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|true|true” animation=”off” border_color_right=”#cc7022″ border_color_all_image=”#bed8cb” border_width_right_image=”1px” border_color_right_image=”#f0f0f0″ border_color_bottom_image=”#bed8cb” border_width_all_image_tablet=”” border_width_all_image_phone=”” border_width_all_image_last_edited=”on|desktop” border_width_right_image_tablet=”” border_width_right_image_phone=”0px” border_width_right_image_last_edited=”on|phone” border_width_bottom_image_tablet=”” border_width_bottom_image_phone=”1px” border_width_bottom_image_last_edited=”on|phone” image_max_width=”70px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

JCG Performance Tracker X offers real-time contract and survey reports that pinpoint areas of strength and weakness while assessing your company’s sales efforts, customer satisfaction, and overall performance.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”Benchmarking” image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/benchmarking.png” icon_placement=”left” image_icon_width=”70px” content_max_width=”100%” icon_placement_tablet=”” icon_placement_phone=”top” icon_placement_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Blurb – Benchmarking” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font_size=”20px” body_line_height=”2.1em” background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” image_icon_custom_padding_tablet=”” image_icon_custom_padding_phone=”” image_icon_custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|true|true” animation=”off” border_color_right=”#cc7022″ border_width_right_image=”1px” border_color_right_image=”#f0f0f0″ border_color_bottom_image=”#bed8cb” border_width_all_image_tablet=”” border_width_all_image_phone=”” border_width_all_image_last_edited=”on|phone” border_width_right_image_tablet=”” border_width_right_image_phone=”0px” border_width_right_image_last_edited=”on|phone” border_width_bottom_image_tablet=”” border_width_bottom_image_phone=”1px” border_width_bottom_image_last_edited=”on|phone” image_max_width=”70px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Filter by date range, company, location, region, arranger, and case type. With this level of visibility, you’ll know exactly where your company stands with regard to performance, customer satisfaction, and sales.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”Trend Spotting” image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/trend-spotting.png” icon_placement=”left” image_icon_width=”70px” content_max_width=”100%” icon_placement_tablet=”” icon_placement_phone=”top” icon_placement_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Blurb – Trendspotting” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ header_font_size=”20px” body_line_height=”2.1em” background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” image_icon_custom_padding_tablet=”” image_icon_custom_padding_phone=”” image_icon_custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|true|true” animation=”off” hover_enabled=”0″ border_color_right=”#cc7022″ border_width_right_image=”1px” border_color_right_image=”#f0f0f0″ border_color_bottom_image=”#bed8cb” border_width_all_image_tablet=”” border_width_all_image_phone=”” border_width_all_image_last_edited=”on|phone” border_width_right_image_tablet=”” border_width_right_image_phone=”0px” border_width_right_image_last_edited=”on|phone” border_width_bottom_image_tablet=”” border_width_bottom_image_phone=”1px” border_width_bottom_image_last_edited=”on|phone” image_max_width=”70px” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

The industry’s case mix is shifting and average sales are changing. This means you need to stay ahead of the curve by continually anticipating customer needs and understanding the trajectory of your business.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”Customer Experience” image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/customer-experience.png” icon_placement=”left” image_icon_width=”70px” content_max_width=”100%” icon_placement_tablet=”” icon_placement_phone=”top” icon_placement_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Blurb – Customer Experience” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font_size=”20px” body_line_height=”2.1em” background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” image_icon_custom_padding_tablet=”” image_icon_custom_padding_phone=”” image_icon_custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|true|true” animation=”off” border_color_right=”#cc7022″ border_color_all_image=”#bed8cb” border_width_right_image=”1px” border_color_right_image=”#f0f0f0″ border_color_bottom_image=”#bed8cb” border_width_all_image_tablet=”” border_width_all_image_phone=”” border_width_all_image_last_edited=”on|phone” border_width_right_image_tablet=”” border_width_right_image_phone=”0px” border_width_right_image_last_edited=”on|phone” border_width_bottom_image_tablet=”” border_width_bottom_image_phone=”1px” border_width_bottom_image_last_edited=”on|phone” image_max_width=”70px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

 Be able to reward your team for the outstanding customer service they provide. Gain key insights, and know how your families feel about the level of service and overall experience your business provides.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”How It Works” _builder_version=”4.16″ locked=”off” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_slider admin_label=”Sliders” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_slide heading=”Step 1: Assess Your Customers’ Experience” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/information-gathering-2.jpg” background_enable_image=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_transition=”on”]

Get more out of your surveys and evaluate your business from every angle. We measure your performance based on the customer experience.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading=”Step 2: Evaluate Your Team’s Sales Performance” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/exploratory-and-engagement-3.jpg” background_enable_image=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_transition=”on”]

We gather your data, assess your contracts, and compare your call volume to other firms of your size. We also evaluate your average sale per case type by company, region, location, and arranger.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading=”Step 3: Take Action Based on Customer Feedback” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/valuation.jpg” background_enable_image=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_transition=”on”]

 Once the data is collected, you’ll be notified immediately of an interaction, so you can take action.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading=”Step 4: Remain Aware and Engaged” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/buyer-review.jpg” background_enable_image=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_transition=”on”]

Monitor customer sentiments shared on social channels and engage accordingly, so you can better manage your online reputation.

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_slider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Testimonial” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#F0F0F0″ da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” locked=”off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/quote.svg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”Bitter||||||||” text_text_color=”#1e4a75″ text_font_size=”15px” text_line_height=”2.1em” header_2_font_size=”20px” header_3_font_size=”14px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

A word from our clients

Thank you for constructing a solid survey format that gives us true customer feedback. We use our survey data to evaluate and upgrade all of our team, but especially our administrative staff. The direct feedback from families along with the format you use gives us the ability to provide objective feedback during our performance appraisals and coaching. It is hard to argue with “what the family said”! Keep up the great work of pushing the profession to higher levels.

– Jay Dodds

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”CTA with Background Image – Global” _builder_version=”4.16″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_stops=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92) 0%|rgba(30,74,117,0.92) 100%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92)” background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/services-cta-bg.jpg” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” saved_tabs=”all” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/icon-conversation.svg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_line_height=”2.1em” header_2_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” width=”780px” max_width=”90%” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Let’s start the conversation

With a clear understanding of where the profession has been, and a compelling vision of where it’s going, we help our clients reach new levels of success. Let’s talk about how we can do the same for you.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjQ0ODgifX0=@” button_text=”Get In Touch” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_color=”#cc7022″ button_border_width=”0px” button_font=”Bitter||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
